recipesJson.name: Warlike Mailboxes
recipesJson.author: Ebc88
recipesJson.description: @id10t mentioned he wanted a graham cracker butterscotch tobacco. Since LB didnâ€™t do a very good job of it with their concentrate.  So I decided to take a stab at it. It is really tasty off the shake but with FLV tobaccos they fade out around 5-7 days then come back around day 10-14. So I would recommend a 10 day steep.
